description: Number of polynomial functions from Z to Z/nZ.
links: M. Bhargava, The factorial function and generalizations, Amer. Math. Monthly, 107 (Nov. 2000), 783-799.
formula: a(n) = Product (n/gcd(n, k!), k=0..n-1).Multiplicative with a(p^e) = p^t_p(e). - _David W. Wilson_, Aug 14 2005Conjectures: a(prime(n)) = A051674(n). a(prime(n)^2) = A011757(n)^A011757(n). a(prime(n)^3) = A055875(n)^A055875(n). - _R. J. Mathar_, Apr 01 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 24 2000
